verse: श्रुतिमपरे स्मृतिमपरे भारतमपरे भजन्तु भवभीताः । अहमिह नंदं वन्दे यस्यालिंदे परं ब्रह्म ॥

words_meaning.भवभीताः: those who are afraid of worldly existence

overall_meaning: May those who are afraid of worldly existence worship the Supreme, who is beyond the Vedas, beyond the Smritis, and beyond the Mahabharata. Here, I worship Nanda, at whose feet resides the Supreme Brahman.
